title: New Google Assistant
content:
My Assistant switched between the new „light bar“, „compact“ and the „old“ design forth and back and now, since while, it stayed on the latter again. A non-uniform rollout is rather frustrating.
I'm currently using it in german language, sometimes english.

Question: Does anyone else have this? I thought the new „light bar “ design is standard by now.

Note: If I delete data in the Google app I get the „light bar" immediately and it lasts until the next day.

Greetings
Oliver
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
